# description

**Instance Property**

A string that represents the contents of the set, formatted as a property list.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing a Set

- **description(withLocale:)**: Returns a string that represents the contents of the set, formatted as a property list.

items.description: Returns a string that represents the contents of the set, formatted as a property list.
items.name: description(withLocale:)

title: description
